ComicInfo.Title: Prog 2407
ComicInfo.Summary:
I am The Mighty Tharg, Betelgeusian bestower of galactic gifts in the form of this SF anthology!
Welcome back, Terrans, to the ghafflebette highlight of your week — that moment when you get to temporarily shrug off everyday reality and take a plunge into the pages of the scrotnig GGC.
In fact, it’s quite a week in the real world — if you’re a subscriber, you may well be reading these words before the US election, but if you’ve this picked up from your local Thrill-merchant it’ll be the day after. How it’ll all pan out even my mighty powers of foresight can’t quite ascertain — that whole attempted insurrection thing wasn’t on my election bingo card back in 2021 — so Quaxxann only knows what’s in store this time around!
Back to the House of Tharg, and we have a new Dredd thriller starting this prog, courtesy of the Carroll and Willsher droids, joining Rogue Trooper, Azimuth, Nightmare New York and The Out.
Also new this week from the Treasury of British Comics imprint is a Scream! special, celebrating the title’s fortieth annivesary, and this year’s Treasury Annual with a tantalising mix of new stories and classic reprint. Enjoy!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-08 00:40:42. [CVDB1076675]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Abnett, Garth Ennis, Kek-W, Michael Carroll
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ben Willsher, David Roach, Mark Harrison, Patrick Goddard, Tazio Bettin
ComicInfo.Inker: Ben Willsher, David Roach, Mark Harrison, Patrick Goddard, Tazio Bettin
ComicInfo.Letterer: Annie Parkhouse, Jim Campbell, Rob Steen, Simon Bowland
